thread.title: Coty Inc. to Webcast First Quarter Fiscal 2016 Financial Results on November 5, 2015
thread.title_full: Coty Inc. to Webcast First Quarter Fiscal 2016 Financial Results on November 5, 2015 - Yahoo Finance

author: Coty Inc.
title: Coty Inc. to Webcast First Quarter Fiscal 2016 Financial Results on November 5, 2015
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
Coty Inc. ( COTY ) will release fiscal 2016 first quarter financial results before the open of the U.S. equity markets on the morning of Thursday, November 5, 2015. 
On that date, at 9:00 a.m. (ET), the Company will webcast live its conference call discussing the results, business outlook, and recent corporate developments. Bart Becht, interim CEO and Chairman, and Patrice de Talhouёt, Executive Vice President and CFO, will host the call. 
Those wishing to access the webcast can do so at http://investors.coty.com . The webcast will also be archived on the website. 
About Coty Inc. 
Coty is a leading global beauty company with net revenues of $4.4 billion for the fiscal year ended June 30, 2015. Founded in Paris in 1904, Coty is a pure play beauty company with a portfolio of well-known fragrances, color cosmetics and skin & body care products sold in over 130 countries and territories. Coty's product offerings include such global brands as adidas, Calvin Klein, Chloé, DAVIDOFF, Marc Jacobs, OPI, philosophy, Playboy, Rimmel and Sally Hansen .
